bean.p:instructionalText: @{document.developmentProposal.isParent() ? 'Cannot add personnel to parent proposal' : 'Search for and add key personnel'}

bean.p:promptText: Are you sure you want to delete @{#lp.fullName}?

bean.p:messageText: [color=red]Proposal is a Child in Proposal Hierarchy. Certifications must take place in the Parent proposal.[/color]

bean.p:promptText: Are you sure you want to clear all the answers?

bean.p:messageText: You have the option to @{#line.getOptInCertificationStatus()?'remove':'add'} Certification Questions for a @{#line.getRole().getDescription()}.
A newer version of the proposal person certification questionnaire has been published. An Update is required.

bean.p:value: Copy the answers from the old version of the questionnaire to the new one. Only questions that have been changed in the new version will have to be answered.
Do not copy answers from previous version of the questionnaire. Every question in the new version of the questionnaire will have to be answered.
